item.title: Bookmark

Bivariate distributions with ordered marginals Copulae on products of compact Riemannian manifolds Parametric copula adjusted for non- and semiparametric regression, The Annals of Statistics(2022) Measuring dependence in the Wasserstein distance for Bayesian nonparametric models, The Annals of Statistics(2021) Vine copula approximation: a generic method for coping with conditional dependence, Stat Comput (2018) 28:219–237 コピュラの幾何学 Permutation inference とbirkhoff polytope バーコフ多面体 = チェス盤コピュラ全体 Geometry of Discrete Copula, Perrone 2019 ウルトラモジュラコピュラ Bayesianコピュラ Bayesian Approaches to Copula Modelling MCMC for copula Extreme Copula（極値コピュラ） A New Estimator for the Pickands Dependence Function extreme copulaの密度関数 link Kamnitui et al.
